articles.content:
Socialist emulation called for 
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers of the Sowon Cooperative Farm in Pyoksong county, South Hwanghae Province, held a rally and challenged the agricultural workers throughout the country to a socialist emulation to successfully carry out the tasks facing the agricultural field in the joint editorial of the first year of the 21st century.
 It was noted at the rally that the agricultural field takes a very important share in augmenting the national economic potentials commensurate with the new era of the army-first revolution.    
 The rally underscored the need to observe the principle of planting the right crop in right area and the right crop in right time, while effecting innovations in seed cultivation and potato farming.

Pakistani charge d'affaires hosts reception 
    Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Ahmed Hussain Dayo, Pakistani charge  d'affaires A.I. here, hosted a reception at the embassy yesterday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 90 (2001)  invited there were Pak Kil Yon, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
 speeches were made there.
